name: Hotel Liminal
description:
Headphones recommended! Not recommended to run on a low-end PC

Walk inside a quiet hotel at night. You can try opening all the doors you want but no-one is going to answer.

How to play

WASD to move
R to restart, ESC to exit game

Note: This is a proof-of-concept and not a finished game. At this point all this game is a walking simulator. Tested only on Windows 10, please comment if the game doesn't work.
